item.title: Memorable Moments of the 2025 MTV Video Music Awards: Mariah Carey, Lady Gaga and More
item.description: Mariah Carey and Busta Rhymes were honored for the first time, Lady Gaga crossed town and Doja Cat took it back to the 1980s.

item.title: Gunmen Attack Bus Stop in Jerusalem, Killing at Least 6
item.description: The Israeli police described the shooting as a terrorist attack and said that the perpetrators had been killed at the scene.

item.title: Rick Davies, Lead Singer of Supertramp, Dies at 81
